extension.description:
SponsorBlock browser extension ported to Kodi's YouTube and Invidious plugins.
SponsorBlock is a crowdsourced project to skip sponsor segments in YouTube videos. Users submit when a sponsor happens and the add-on automatically skips sponsors it knows about.
extension.disclaimer: This is an unoffical port of the SponsorBlock browser extension
extension.news: - Get current player's time after a delay instead of relying on seek target (#28) - Add option to reduce all skips by some time (#30) - Ignore segments that do not fit into reduce skips setting (#31) - Reset existing playback when new video starts playing (#32) - Support for Kodi's Invidious plugin (#45) - Add option to only skip if longer than minimum duration
extension.summary: Überspringe Sponsoren, betteln um Abonnenten und mehr in YouTube Videos
